item.title: Team
item.description: GROUP LEADER Dr. Ruiqi Han (éŸ©ç‘ç¦) Principal Investigator & Group Leader Ruiqi Han is a principal investigator, assistant professor at Institute of Modern Biology (IMB) of Nanjing University. The group is interested in understanding how higher order 3D genomic architechtures are orgnized and their dynamic interactions with other cellular processes, such as transcription, replication, and DNA damage repair.
